channel.title: mararecords's Podcast (www.mararecords.com)
channel.description:
MaraRecords now with a street address in Rio de Janeiro, a residential address, visitors interested in buying true rare gems of brazilian music in vinyl please be in touch at
supernut@unisys.com.br
to date a meeting...
*** WE ARE ONLY ACCEPTING ORDERS WITH TOTAL AMOUNT OVER US$ 270, SHIPPING IS FREE ANYWHERE !!!
Be Cool , Be Vintage , Touch The Music , Enjoy Big Art Covers , Enjoy The Warm , Cool and Real Experience Listening to a VINYL RECORD , BUY BRAZILIAN MUSIC ... In VINYL !!!
Ask for COMPLETE CATALOG by visiting this link:
http://mararecordsdata.com/catalog.htm
Welcome to MARARECORDS Go Online at
http://www.mararecords.com
BRAZILIAN LPS GROOVE BOSSA JAZZ SOUL FUNK RARE RECORDS
Go Online at http://www.mararecords.com
Brazilian Lps Groove Bossa Jazz Soul Funk Rare Vinyl Records
Brazilian Music Specialists.
We ONLY work with ORIGINAL RECORDS (most from 50's to 90's). We also carry ALL BRAZILIAN PRESSING records. (Mainly BRAZILIAN MUSIC VINYL RECORDS ). If you are a serious collector or also a DJ looking for brazilian original records, this is a place for you.
Go Online at http://www.mararecords.com
Brazilian Music Guide
Brazilian Music Vinyl Records Marketplace.
We also serve vinyl hunters , dancefloor hunters , and the ones into:
bossa nova brasil brazil brazilian dance floor jazz dancefloor jazz deep disco deep funk free jazz funk fusion jazz dance jazz funk latin library modal jazz modern soul mpb popsike private press psych raregroove rare groove samba scat soul soul jazz spiritual jazz afro afrobeat afrofunk batucada beat boogaloo boogie brasil 60's brasil 70's antonio carlos jobim joao gilberto vinicius de moraes bossa groove bossa nova male bossa nova female bossa nova guitar piano trio brazilian instrumental bossa session bossa mpb bossa overseas brazil taste brazilian taste overseas caetano veloso tropicalia soul&funk soul funk soulfunk clube da esquina mpb male mpb female brazilian fusion brasilian fusion brazil rock brasil rock brazil lp guide brazil cd guide brazil samba nordeste bahia choro instrumental brazil boogie trilha sonora brazilian music lp

item.title: MaraRecords Brazilian Music Soundtrack Grooves Vol.01
item.description:
01) Jose Roberto - Karate 02) Wilson das Neves - Sarro 03) Gustavo - Nao Vou Ficar 04) Jose Roberto - Toboga

*** (01 to 04 from "Roberto Carlos e o Diamante Cor de Rosa" Soundtrack 1970 BRAZIL POLYDOR lpng44054) ***

05) Umas & Outras - Pigmaliao 70 06) The Youngsters - Tema de Kiko 07) Wilson das Neves - A Feira

*** (05 to 07 from "Pigmaliao 70" Soundtrack 1970 BRAZIL PHILIPS r765108l) ***

08) Umas & Outras - Tema de Suzi 09) Umas & Outras - Quarentao Simpatico 10) Orquestra CBD - Tema da Zorra

*** (08 to 10 from "Assim Na Terra Como No Ceu" Soundtrack 1970 BRAZIL PHILIPS r765120l) ***

11) Orquestra Som Livre - Nana

*** (11 from "Escrava Isaura" Soundtrack 1976 BRAZIL SOM LIVRE 4026045) ***

12) Brasil Ritmo 67 - Samba Carioca 13) Banda Carioca - Tema da Perseguicao

*** (12 to 13 from "O Donzelo" Soundtrack 1970 BRAZIL RCA-VICTOR bsl1452) ***

14) Osmar Milito & Quarteto Forma - Mandato 15) Osmar Milito & Quarteto Forma - Corpo Santo Em Mente Sa 16) Marlos Nobre - Ritual

*** (14 to 16 from "Selva de Pedra" Soundtrack 1972 BRAZIL SOM LIVRE sig1012) ***
